#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/HandiEspoirPvad; USER=handiespoir_site PASS=Palmier-21 HOST=handiespoir.fr
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=3 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/public/www/pvad -X public/www/pvad/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='HandiEspoirPvad' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='http://www.handiespoir.fr/pvad/' TYPE='wordpress' SERV='' FAVICON='http://www.handiespoir.fr/pvad/wp-content/themes/pvad2/images/logo.jpg' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
declare -u UPPER_LF="HandiEspoirPvad" mkdir -p $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF ~/.timotheeBin/phploc wp-content/themes > $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phploc.txt ~/.timotheeBin/phpmetrics wp-content/themes --report-html=$HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phpmetrics
